zhen.name: Master Zhen
zhen.title: The Empty Hand
zhen.description: An ancient martial arts master who teaches discipline, patience, and mastery of unarmed combat through harmony of body and mind.
zhen.philosophy: True strength is balance. The body is the tool; the mind is the master.
zhen.emphasis: Unarmed combat, discipline, patience, inner harmony
zhen.voiceStyle: Calm, deliberate, metaphor-rich. Speaks as a teacher whose lessons unfold over time.
zhen.tooltip: Master Zhen reflects your character through discipline, balance, and the way of the empty hand

levelGreetings.1: You seek to master the body. Good. The fist is strong, but the mind must be stronger.
levelGreetings.2: Your stance steadies. A tree does not rush the wind—it waits.
levelGreetings.3: The body moves, but the mind resists. Let thought fall away.
levelGreetings.4: You see intent now. To read the opponent is to read yourself.
levelGreetings.5: Halfway. Mastery is not power—it is understanding.
levelGreetings.6: Weapons fall to those who know the empty hand.
levelGreetings.7: Your body obeys before the mind commands.
levelGreetings.8: Skill is yours. Remember—honor carries farther than strength.
levelGreetings.9: The path narrows. Still the mind. Swift the body.
levelGreetings.10: You have learned the way of the empty hand. Go, and show the galaxy.

master_peaceful.greeting: Peaceful path chosen. Discipline without aggression.

master_flowing.confirmation: Move like water—redirect, do not resist.

guidance.class: Train body, mind, and spirit together.
guidance.talents: Unarmed strikes, defense, and internal discipline.
guidance.skills: Master every movement of the body.
guidance.forcePowers: Choose powers that enhance balance and inner focus.
guidance.summary: The body is the weapon. The mind decides when to strike.

tier1: The body remembers what the mind forgets.
tier2: I learned to fight by learning when not to.
tier3: Violence reveals truth. Discipline reveals meaning.
tier4: I have broken bones to spare lives.
tier5: The empty hand carries the heaviest responsibility.
